name: Hero Posts Lite
author: BoldThemes

sections.description:
Elevate Your WordPress Website With Post Grids

With HeroPosts Lite Plugin by Bold Themes you can create and display your posts in a more attractive manner to promote and emphasize your best content all at once. You can use HeroPosts to create post grids and anywhere on your website. A great number of customization options make this plugin a flexible and easy to use tool with which you can quickly create an interesting and professional appearance.

Demo content

HeroPosts Lite Plugin by Bold Themes comes with 40+ premade templates you can use as-is or edit quickly and easilyhere. Full version contains 100+ premade templetes.

Simplify Content Display With Post Grids

HeroPosts Lite, a post grid plugin for WordPress, is a type of plugin that allows you to display your WordPress posts in a grid layout. This means that your posts are arranged in a visually appealing pattern. Your website’s post grid will look elegant, interesting and professional. You can display posts in grid and slider views.

Efficient Content Curation

This awesome post grid plugin for WordPress comes handy for creators and especially curators of websites such as: online news portal, online newspaper or magazine, review website, sports news, personal blog, travel blog, food blog, technology blog, fitness blog, fashion blog, lifestyle blog, gaming blog, etc.

Transform Your Content Presentation With Post Grids

HeroPosts Lite plugin can be used for simple blogs as well as with more demanding news portals because of its customization possibilities, including: post filters covering essential selection criteria, mouseover effects, accent colors, etc. Because of more complex layouts there is a choice to add inner rows and inner columns. For convenience and less experienced users there is automatic height adjustment. Considering the need to make profit on your website we added the option to include an ad banner in the grid. For more advanced and awesome features consider upgrading to the pro version of the plugin

HeroPosts Plugin by Bold Themes is optimized and fully responsive with many options for setting responsive layouts. Your post grid will look just as good on any mobile screen as it does on desktop screens.

40+ Layout Templates

HeroPosts Lite Plugin, a post grid plugin for WordPress, comes with 40+ premade layout templates. You can use these layouts as is or customize the settings. Full plugin contains 100+ templates.

Awesome Features

HeroPosts Lite Plugin by Bold Themes is a very flexible tool that gives you great possibilities for customization. Here are some of the most prominent features of HeroPosts Lite:

  • Variable number of posts
  • Post filters (category, author, date)
  • Showing posts in a slider
  • Accent color
  • Content (option to show: title, date, time, author, categories, tags)
  • General formatting options (title size, colors etc)
  • Mouseover effects (zoom in/out, overlay opacity in/out)
  • Automatic height adjustment of columns content
  • Inner rows and columns for more advanced layouts
  • Responsive options
  • Include banner in the grid
  • Various styling options and additional documented css variables
  • 40+ ready-to-use templates to use as is or to customize
sections.installation:
Use WordPress Add New Plugin feature (Plugins panel) and search for HeroPosts Lite. Click install and then activate (once the plugin has been installed).

No 3rd party services needed.
sections.faq:
HeroPosts Plugin Compatibility

HeroPosts plugin is compatible with all major page builders via block element or a shortcode:

  • Gutenberg
  • Elementor
  • WP Bakery
  • Bold builder

Is there a premium version?

Yes. There is a Pro version and you can find it here

In addition to the features in Lite version, Pro version offers the following:

  • Additonal post filters (tags, post formats, sticky mark, custom taxonomies)
  • Title H tag
  • Max lines in title and excerpt
  • Post data style
  • Image position
  • Image border radius
  • Additional image hover effects (blur, move content)
  • Separator line width and color
  • 60+ addtional templates
